messages.subject: Need a job
messages.msgSnippet: We re finally settled in here in Indiana - hopefully I ll be able to keep up with the list now.  But, I need a job that I can work at home like on my computer.
messages.messageBody:
We're finally settled in here in Indiana - hopefully I'll be able to
keep up with the list now. But, I need a job that I can work at home
like on my computer. I have no idea how to do it. I have seen so
many "job offers" that sound like a chain letter type thing - you
send the person at the top of the list $5 and we'll put your name at
the bottom, etc. Or we'll sell you an address list and you sell each
one of them an address list, etc. I don't want to do that kind of
thing. Does anyone know what I can do? I don't want to put the kids
in day-care or anything. I'm pretty desperate.

Thanks.

Melanie in Indiana
